title: Immune Boost
description: Rebound and recover faster by supercharging your immune system and fighting infections with our Immune Boost IV - a custom blend of vital antioxidants, vitamins, minerals, electrolytes, and medication.

More Information Treatment Time: 45min. - 1hr.Treatment Time: 45min. - 1hr. Our Immune Boost Therapy If you want to prevent falling ill, already fighting a cold or flu, or neutralize age accelerating oxidants in your body- we can help with our custom Immune Boost IV. It is loaded with megadose of Vitamin C and Glutathione, along with other vitamins, minerals, electrolytes, and medication. Our team can administer it in the comfort and privacy of your home, office, or hotel. Also available at our medical office. Our Immune Boost IV treatment includes: - Up to 1000ml Lactated Ringer/Normal Saline - B-complex - Vitamin (Riboflavin) - Vitamin B3 (Niacin) - Vitamin B5 or Lipotropic MIC B12 - Megadose of Vitamin C (Ascorbic acid) - Glutathione - Magnesium (Magnesium Sulfate) - Folic Acid - Thiamine - Trace elements (Zinc, Copper, Manganese, Chromium, Selenium) - Optional medication chosen during consultation:
